message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.HC, cs.IR. 

The paper discusses the use of ontology-driven systems and software agents to create an adaptive personalized e-learning system. This involves advanced decision-making abilities and monitoring of the learner's behavior. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper also discusses the use of cloud storage, which falls under the sub-category cs.CY (Computers and Society). The paper also focuses on the learner's behavior and interaction with the system, which falls under the sub-categories cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
